actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Procurement and Printing.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for acceptance of a statue of Jeannette Rankin presented by the State of Montana for placement in National Statuary Hall, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Accepts the statue of Jeannette Rankin, the first woman elected to the Congress, for the National Statuary Hall and extends thanks to Montana for contributing the statue. Authorizes ceremonies and the temporary placement of the statue in the rotunda of the Capitol on May 1, 1985. Directs that such proceedings and other pertinent matter be printed as a House document. Specifies the quantity and manner in which such document is to be copied and distributed.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for acceptance of a statue of Jeannette Rankin presented by the State of Montana for placement in National Statuary Hall, and for other purposes.
